mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_NOTICE(NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_REGISTER_DATE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, NOTICE_CONTENT) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle},#{noticeRegisterDate},#{createDate},#{updateDate},#{noticeContent})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_NOTICE ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
